list.name: Support Manager
list.subtitle: Are you passionate about helping others and providing exceptional customer service? We are seeking a dedicated Support Specialist to join our team and assist our valued customers with their inquiries and concerns.

responsibilities.title: Key Responsibilities
list: 1. Customer Assistance: Respond to customer inquiries via various channels, including email, chat, and phone, providing timely and accurate information to resolve issue
2. Issue Resolution: Investigate and troubleshoot customer problems, collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure prompt and effective resolution.
3. Product Knowledge: Develop a deep understanding of our products/services to effectively assist customers and provide relevant information.
4. Documentation: Maintain detailed and accurate records of customer interactions, feedback, and resolutions.
5. Continuous Improvement: Contribute to the improvement of support processes by identifying common issues and suggesting proactive solutions.

quality.title: Qualifications
list: - Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
- Strong problem-solving ability and a customer-centric mindset.
- Ability to work well under pressure and handle challenging situations with empathy.
- Familiarity with customer support software and tools is a plus.

requirements.title: Requirements
list: - High school diploma or equivalent; additional education or certification in customer service is a plus.
- 2 years of experience in B2B sales, preferably in [Forex , funds, affiliate network].
- Proficiency in [relevant software/tools].
- Excellent organizational and time management skills.

list.text: If you are a proactive and customer-oriented individual looking to contribute to a positive customer experience, we invite you to apply for the Support Specialist position. Join our team and be an integral part of providing excellent support to our valued customers.

list.name: Sales Manager
list.subtitle: Are you a dynamic and results-driven individual with a passion for B2B sales? We are seeking a skilled Sales Manager to join our team and drive business growth through strategic client acquisition and relationship management.

responsibilities.title: Key Responsibilities
list: 1. Client Acquisition: Identify and target potential B2B clients, understanding their needs, and presenting tailored solutions to drive sales.
2. Relationship Management: Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with existing clients, ensuring client satisfaction and identifying opportunities for upselling or cross-selling.
3. Market Analysis: Stay abreast of industry trends, competitor activities, and market conditions to identify new business opportunities and enhance our competitive edge.
4. Sales Strategy: Develop and execute effective sales strategies to achieve and exceed sales targets, collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with overall business objectives.
5. Negotiation and Closing: Lead negotiation processes and successfully close deals, ensuring mutually beneficial outcomes for both the client and the company.

quality.title: Qualifications
list: - Proven track record in B2B sales, with a focus on meeting and exceeding targets.
- Strong interpersonal and communication skills to effectively engage with clients and internal teams.
- Strategic thinking and the ability to develop and implement successful sales strategies.
- Experience in negotiating and closing complex B2B deals.
- Familiarity with the industry and a keen understanding of market dynamics.
